docs.lead_paragraph: Citing concern over overdoses, doctors at Seven Counties Services in Louisville have stopped writing prescriptions for the anti-anxiety drug Xanax.

headline.seo: In Louisville, a Center’s Doctors Cut Off Xanax Prescriptions
headline.main: Abuse of Xanax Leads a Clinic to Halt Supply
headline.print_headline: Abuse of Xanax Leads a Clinic To Halt Supply

docs.snippet: Citing concern over overdoses, doctors at Seven Counties Services in Louisville have stopped writing prescriptions for the anti-anxiety drug Xanax.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Laurie H. Glimcher, who has ties to pharmaceutical giants and to scientific and biotechnology companies, said she wants to forge partnerships with both the public and private sectors.

headline.seo: Laurie H. Glimcher Named Dean of Weill Cornell Medical College
headline.main: Harvard Researcher Chosen as New Dean of Weill Cornell Medical College
headline.print_headline: Harvard Researcher Chosen as New Dean of Weill Cornell Medical College

docs.snippet: Dr. Laurie H. Glimcher, who has ties to pharmaceutical giants and to scientific and biotechnology companies, said she wants to forge partnerships with both the public and private sectors.
